## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

10mm External Circlip Carbon Black

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 10mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.63** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/10mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

## 10mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.63** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## 11mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.62** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/11mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

ROTOR CLIP


## 12mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.62** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/12mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

13mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black


From **€3.62** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/13mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 13mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.62** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/13mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

14mm Internal Circlips Carbon Black


From **€3.62** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/14mm-internal-circlips-carbon-black?currency=EUR#variants)

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

## 15mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.68** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/15mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

JG Engineering


## 16mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.68** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/16mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

17mm External Circlip Carbon Black


From **€3.87** ~~~~

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 17mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.87** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

18mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black


From **€3.68** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/18mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR#variants)

We ship with DPD

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

Need to collect? We are open 9am - 5pm Mon Friday Saturday 10am - 4PM

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 18mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.68** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 19mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.92** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/19mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

19mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 20mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.92** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/20mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

21mm External Circlip Carbon Black


From **€3.95** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/21mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR#variants)

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 21mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.95** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/21mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

22mm External Circlip Carbon Black


From **€3.97** ~~~~

[Choose options](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/22mm-external-circlip-ireland?currency=EUR#variants)

Order before 2pm for next day delivery

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)

## Size Matters!

_**No one in Ireland stocks the size range we do. Whether you need a pack of 2 or a box of 2,000 we've got you covered.**_

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/cdn/shop/files/DULUX_PAINT.jpg?v=1753876614&width=1200)

View details


###### Circlips

We stock a comprehensive range of internal and external circlips, available in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 2mm to 280mm, ensuring solutions for a wide variety of applications.

View details


###### Roll Pins

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

View details


###### Cotter pins

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

View details


###### Spirol Pins

Our selection of spirol pins, featuring a unique Swiss-roll design for enhanced strength and flexibility, is unmatched. We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 22mm External Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.97** ~~~~

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Description

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

View details

When it comes to roll pins, our range is second to none. We stock diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths available for each size. All pins are available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, ensuring durability and performance for any application.

We stock an extensive range of cotter pins in both standard steel and stainless steel. Sizes range from 1.5mm to 20mm in diameter, with 16 different lengths available in each diameter.

We offer diameters from 1.5mm to 30mm, with up to 16 different lengths per size. Available in both spring carbon steel and stainless steel, they’re ideal for high-performance fastening applications.

## 22mm Internal Circlip Carbon Black

From **€3.87** ~~~~

**Internal Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for bores with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://www.jgengineering.ie/products/22mm-internal-circlip-carbon-black?currency=EUR)

## About Us

Founded in 1979 by John Grant, JG Engineering Supplies Ltd is a family-owned business with a proud history of serving the engineering and hardware industries. Before establishing the company, John brought a wealth of experience from his roles as a Senior Engineering Purchaser at Semperit Tyres Ireland Ltd and as a Mechanical Engineering Lecturer at Bolton Street College.

JG Engineering Supplies began with a focus on circlips, pins of all shapes and sizes, and helicoils, quickly expanding into a full range of fasteners in stainless steel, high-tensile, and other specialist materials. Over the past 45 years, we have grown and diversified, now stocking over 40,000 products, including a comprehensive hardware selection and also sell online under www.mydiy.ie

At JG Engineering Supplies, we take pride in our expert technical support, ensuring every customer—regardless of order size—receives the highest level of service. If you need it, we have it, and if we don’t, we’ll get it for you.

## Delivery and Shipping

**Shipping Information**

Place your order before 2 PM for same-day shipping!

We partner with **DPD** for all deliveries, ensuring **full traceability** and a **one-hour delivery window**, so you don’t have to wait around all day.

**Shipping Cost:** €8.99

**Free Shipping:** On orders over €50

Fast, reliable, and hassle-free delivery—straight to your door!

All our orders are picked, packed and shipped in Dublin! Order before 2pm for Next Day DPD Delivery anywhere in Ireland.

## Description

**External Circlips:** The most common form of axially fitted circlips for shafts with grooves.

The circlip has a large free diameter and gap width, consequently it fits more tightly into the groove and provides higher and more uniform thrust load capacity. Lugs with holes are provided for rapid fitting or removal with circlip pliers.

Standard material: Carbon Spring Steel - Standard Finish: Phosphate and Oil

**Benefits:** Cost effective replacement, durable, removable.

1. Printing and precision applications

2. Pharmaceutical and food industry

3. Gearboxes and differentials

4. Light and heavy industrial use

5. General engineering applications

6.Great Quality parts shipped the same day

![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0176/5306/files/ask-question-2-ce96e3e01c85a38a0d39c61cfae6d42c_small.jpg?263)
